TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Substitution extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 指定输出缓存网页上免于缓存的部分。

span.span: Specifies a section on an output-cached Web page that is exempt from caching.

summary.span: 在此位置，会检索动态内容，并以动态内容替换 控件。

span.span: At this location, dynamic content is retrieved and substituted for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件可以指定输出缓存的网页上的一个部分, 该网页需要用来替换控件的动态内容。Use the control to specify a section on an output-cached Web page where you want dynamic content substituted for the control. 对于大部分内容缓存的页面,控件都为部分页面缓存提供简化的解决方案。The control offers a simplified solution to partial page caching for pages where the majority of the content is cached. 您可以输出缓存整个页面, 然后使用控件指定不受缓存控制的页面部分。You can output-cache the entire page, and then use controls to specify the parts of the page that are exempt from caching. 缓存区域只执行一次, 并从缓存中重播, 直到缓存项过期或被清除为止。Cached regions execute only once and are replayed from the cache until the cache entry expires or is purged. 每次请求页面时, 都会执行动态区域。Dynamic regions execute each time the page is requested. 此缓存模型简化了主要为静态的页的代码, 因为无需将节封装到 Web 用户控件中。This caching model simplifies the code for pages that are primarily static, because you do not have to encapsulate the sections to cache in Web user controls. 例如, 此缓存模型对于包含静态内容 (如新闻报道) 和显示广告的控件的页面非常有用。For example, this caching model is useful in a scenario where you have a page that contains static content, such as news stories, and an control that displays advertisements. 新闻故事不会更改, 这意味着可以对其进行缓存。The news stories do not change, which means that they can be cached. 但是, 用户每次请求页面时, 都要显示新的广告。However, each time a user requests the page, you want to display a new advertisement. 控件直接支持缓存后替换, 并在每次回发页面时呈现新广告, 无论页面是否已缓存。The control directly supports post-cache substitution and renders a new advertisement each time the page posts back, regardless of whether the page is cached. > [!NOTE] > 可以将控件放置在包含在缓存页中的用户控件中。You can place a control in a user control that is contained in a cached page. 但是, 不能将控件放置在输出缓存的用户控件中。However, you cannot place a control in an output-cached user control. 当控件执行时, 它会调用返回字符串的方法。When the control executes, it calls a method that returns a string. 此方法返回的字符串是要在控件位置的页面上显示的内容。The string that the method returns is the content to display on the page at the location of the control. 使用属性指定在执行控件时要调用的回调方法的名称。 Use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 指定的回调方法必须是包含该控件的页或用户控件上的静态方法。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or user control that contains the control. 回调方法的签名必须与 采用参数并返回字符串的委托的签名匹配。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 若要为页面操作输出缓存, 可以使用[@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指令、 类或属性。To manipulate the output cache for a page, you can use the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive, the class, or the property. 有关缓存页面的详细信息, 请参阅[缓存 ASP.NET 页面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100))和[缓存 ASP.NET 页面的部分](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e)。For more information on caching pages, see [Caching ASP.NET Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100)) and [Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e). 作为使用控件的替代方法, 还可以使用委托获取替换缓存行为。As an alternative to using the control, you can also get substitution caching behavior using a delegate. 此外, 还可以获取直接支持此功能的控件 (如控件) 的替换缓存行为。In addition, you can get substitution caching behavior on controls, such as the control, that directly support this feature. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[动态更新部分缓存页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09c9bd9a-0d68-4a5c-aa6f-1b461c208795)。For more information, see [Dynamically Updating Portions of a Cached Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09c9bd9a-0d68-4a5c-aa6f-1b461c208795). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将控件添加到输出缓存的网页中。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control declaratively to an output-cached Web page. 加载页面时, 将在标签中向用户显示当前日期和时间。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 页面的此部分缓存并仅每60秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时, 它将`GetCurrentDateTime`调用方法。 When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method. 返回的字符串`GetCurrentDateTime`将显示给用户。The string returned by `GetCurrentDateTime` is displayed to the user. 页面的此部分不会缓存, 并在每次刷新页面时更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionsClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionsClass1/CS/substitutionclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionsClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionsClass1/VB/substitutionclass1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来创建和初始化类的新实例。 Use the constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将控件添加到输出缓存的网页中。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control programmatically to an output-cached Web page. 加载页面时, 将在标签中向用户显示当前日期和时间。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 页面的此部分缓存并仅每60秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时, 它将`GetCurrentDateTime`调用方法。 When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method. 返回的字符串`GetCurrentDateTime`将显示给用户。The string returned by `GetCurrentDateTime` is displayed to the user. 页面的此部分不会缓存, 并在每次刷新页面时更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/CS/substitutioncstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/VB/substitutioncstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象指示 控件不支持子控件。

span.span: Returns an object, indicating that the control does not support child controls.
An , indicating that the control does not support child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用于创建用于存储控件的子控件的对象。 The method is typically used to create a object to store the child controls for a control. 控件的方法 的实现始终返回对象, 以指示该控件不支持子控件。 The implementation of the method for a control always returns an object, to indicate that the control does not support child controls.

para.span: 扩展控件时, 可以在派生类中重写方法, 以支持子控件。

span.span: When extending the control, you can override the method in a derived class to support child controls.

related.span: 替换 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Substitution Web Server Control

.property instance string MethodName
Public Overridable Property MethodName As String

member this.MethodName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件执行时调用的回调方法的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes.

value.span: 字符串，表示要在 控件执行时调用的方法的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method to invoke when the control executes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定在执行控件时要调用的回调方法的名称。 Use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 指定的回调方法必须是包含该控件的页或用户控件上的静态方法。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or user control that contains the control. 回调方法的签名必须与 采用参数并返回字符串的委托的签名匹配。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for a delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 回调方法返回的字符串是要在控件位置的页面上显示的内容。The string that the callback method returns is the content to display on the page at the location of the control. 参数封装有关单个 http 请求的所有 http 特定的信息。The parameter encapsulates all HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request. 你可以使用它来访问会话变量、授权信息和个性化设置详细信息。You can use it to access session variables, authorization information, and personalization details. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将控件添加到输出缓存的网页中。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control declaratively to an output-cached Web page. 加载页面时, 将向用户显示静态项目符号列表。When the page loads, a static bulleted list is displayed to the user. 页面的此部分缓存并仅每60秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated only every 60 seconds. 当控件执行时, 它会`GetUser`调用方法, 该方法将返回表示当前用户的字符串。 When the control executes, it calls the `GetUser` method, which returns a string that represents the current user. 此字符串显示在页面上的控件位置。This string is displayed at the location of the control on the page. 页面的此部分不会缓存, 并在每次刷新页面时更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Substitution.MethodName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Substitution.MethodName/CS/substitution.methodnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Substitution.MethodName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Substitution.MethodName/VB/substitution.methodnamevb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 用于接收服务器控件内容的 对象。

span.span: The object that receives the server control content.

summary.span: 将服务器控件内容发送到给定的 对象，该对象可编写将在客户端呈现的内容。

span.span: Sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
